Specify the subtitle of a card

Source: R/card-parts.R
card_subtitle.Rd

Specify the subtitle of a card

card_subtitle(subtitle, level = 6)

Arguments

subtitle

String specifying the subtitle

level

Level of header (integer between 1 and 6, default = 6)

Value

A "shiny.tag" object
